item.title: Code help... no error just doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @tyguy tyguy
item.description:
@tyguy wrote:

The code works but not like I want. It should be simple just I don’t know how to.

My code

if (command.startsWith("rebootw") && playerRights >= 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("REBOOTING THE SERVER!!! LOG BACK IN AFTER 2 MINS... "); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("REBOOTING THE SERVER!!! LOG BACK IN AFTER 2 MINS... "); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("REBOOTING THE SERVER!!! LOG BACK IN AFTER 2 MINS... "); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("REBOOTING THE SERVER!!! LOG BACK IN AFTER 2 MINS... "); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("REBOOTING THE SERVER!!! LOG BACK IN AFTER 2 MINS... "); sendMessage("Type ::reboot to kick all players..."); }

But when the code is used it just says it to everyone 1 time not 5.
Please help and thanks.
If you would like to come check my server out its
Name: Poonscape
IP: 68.118.151.120
Port: 43594

Read full topic
